API Documentation¶

In this section we are going to provide the API documentation for using the RESTful web-services that we have created. In order to do so, we are going to create a basic structure where you can find clearly defined how to call the web-services using, for instance the tool cUrl.

Structure¶

You can find the following parameters in de documentation:

Arguments, where you get to know which arguments must be provided.

Return The value that returns.

URL The URL for calling this web service

Method Whether the method is GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.

Example an example showing how to call the web service

Applications¶

  • Coltrane
    • Get post by author
    • Get post by id
    • Create entry
    • Update entry by id
    • Delete entry by id
  • Community
    • Get communities
    • Create community
    • Update community
    • Delete community
    • Get resources by community
    • Create resource
    • Update resource
    • Delete resource
  • File Handler (FHY)
    • Consult files by username
    • Consult images by username
    • Consult by space
    • Consult file by id
    • Consult image by id
    • Create file
    • Create image
    • Update file
    • Update image
    • Delete file
    • Delete image
    • Delete file
    • Delete image
  • Spaces
    • Get user spaces
    • Create user space
    • Update user space
  • Portfolio
    • Get portfolio
    • Create portfolio
    • Update portfolio
    • Delete portfolio
    • Get studies
    • Add study
    • Update studies
    • Delete study
    • Get projects
    • Add project
    • Update project
    • Delete project
    • Get skills
    • Add skill
    • Update skill
    • Delete skill
